thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express Earls Court - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great value, convenient location
thread.title_full: Great value, convenient location - Review of Holiday Inn Express Earls Court, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Gamz M
title: Great value, convenient location
text: Stayed for a week. Lovely staff, clean and comfortable room, nice breakfast, excellent wi-fi, it was really a great value. Near to 2 underground stations , bus stop is right in front of the hotel. Will choose to stay here again on my next visit to London.
